Memorisia

Memorise your things!

Installation Preview

Installation

The app is not currently available in any app store, but you can manually install it.

Simply download the latest apk from GitHub, make sure you have Unknown Sources enabled, then open the it in your phone.

If you have trouble installing it, please open an issue here.
